Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Regenerating Rose" cannot be activated when you have 1 or fewer open Monster Card Zones.

PSCT.Edison: ① If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 2 "Regenerating Rose Tokens" (Plant/DARK/Level 3/ATK 1200/DEF 1200).
